strapiPost.title: Bentonville Ranks 2nd In USA Today's Best Small Towns For Adventure
strapiPost.content:
Bentonville continues to earn attention as an outdoor destination, most recently earning second place on USA Today's Best Small Town for Adventure poll.

  • Trail bombing: Known as the mountain biking capital of the world, Bentonville is famous for adrenaline-inducing biking trails like Slaughter Pen, Little Sugar Trail, and Blowing Springs.
  • Land of Oz: Bentonville's unique location in the Ozarks mountains provides an endless variety of outdoor adventures, both in the city and in the surrounding region's lakes, hiking trails, and both state and national parks.
